name: Doom 666
description: Umm... well... it's a wad... you can go outside, inside, north, south, east, west, up, down, left, right... umm... up down??? Quake2 was released exactly four days ago, and I being the Quake-a-holic I am, get a little confused sometimes. Well, this is really sad. I made a Quake2 map and actually ran it (simple box and not much more) before I finished a Doom WAD. What's wrong with this picture?
